3. Week 3: Won against Cincinnati Bengals, 35-17. They scored 35, opponents scored 17.
4. Week 4: Won against Atlanta Falcons, 24-10. Scored 24, opponents scored 10.
5. Week 5: Lost to Washington Redskins, 24-27. Dolphins scored 24, opponents scored 29.

Week 1: 7
Week 2: 7
Week 3: 35
Week 4: 24
Week 5: 24
Week 6: 21

Adding these up: 7+7=14, 14+35=49, 49+24=73, 73+24=97, 97+21=118. So Dolphins scored a total of 118 points.

Week 1: 31
Week 2: 14
Week 3:17
Week4:10
Week5:27
Week6:19
